problem.markdown: When the arithmatic operations are carried out in the PLC, if the data type for source and destination is not similar then, ( ) loss of accuracy and rounding error occurs ( ) Instruction takes more time to execute. (x) Both 1 and 2 above
problem.p: When the arithmatic operations are carried out in the PLC, if the data type for source and destination is not similar then,

choicegroup.choice: loss of accuracy and rounding error occurs
Instruction takes more time to execute.
